name: mikeleffel2
text: A comment left by mikeleffel2 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by geesycreesy, SkeletalGiraffe, morbo)

name: thicker
text: My nephew told me that he was going to send my picture to the whole world, even China and Santa, the other day. For some reason, I immediately thought of the last panel of this strip.

name: gouldgonewild
text: On the beach once, I heard a child proclaim to his friend to be careful digging his hole, for he might hit a Chinaman.

name: spinynorman
text:
I have also heard that from my Grandma.

You think I am kidding.

name: neonaoneo
text: This comment is the best, and it has the least chubbies out of the big four

name: tekende
text: A comment left by tekende was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, ravindra108, Skodra, AidenS123)

name: nonanon
text:
At first, I thought no one got your brilliant reference.

Then I realized you only made it two days ago.

Either way, chubs ahoy.

name: mangecoeur
text: Tekende, the Chinaman is not the issue here.

name: shadowlink_97
text: They're not asian-american if they live on the other side of the world, not in america.

name: tekende
text: I guess three people thought I was being a dick about nomenclature and lamed me.

name: fermatprime
text: They're out of their element.

name: karljw
text: the instant i read this asset, i was overcome by a powerful urge to drop everything i was doing (reading achewood) and re-watch the big lebowski for the oh 4th time. it's that good.

name: saint
text:
"i'm sending you a picture of the Earth."

"...that's a picture of my mother wearing a blue and green shirt."

"damn. my bad."

name: jackparsons
text: "The sailors keep her down in the hold, to keep the ship stable."

name: apocowarg
text: "Her baby pictures had to be taken by satellite."

name: saint
text: ultrasounds of her children had to be taken by actual spelunkers.

name: norrin
text: She fell in love and broke it.

name: reverendphlegm
text: It took her two trips to haul ass.

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, amandulence, Doc_Rostov)

name: heccibiggs
text: That one has never made sense to me.

name: scraggg
text: The woman is so morbidly obese that she does not fit through infinite oblivion.

name: farqussus
text: That's basically the point of it.

name: apricotta
text: I would chubby you for you avatar, if only I had any of them left.

name: apricotta
text: Whoah. First I saw scraggg's avatar, then I wanted to give him a chubby, then I saw I already did, then I saw my own comment and now it feels hella weird. What the hell is what I'm basically asking.

name: supahlovah
text: F#A#Infinity is better, IMO.

name: apocowarg
text: Agreed.

name: saint
text: this one is as funny as hitting an infant with a hammer.

name: retinarow
text: Which is HILARIOUS.

name: saint
text: every time she wears high heels, she strikes oil.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: Yo mama so fat, when she goes to the movie theater, she sits next to everybody.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Also re: movie theatres-

She has a job at one as one of the screens.

Due to her large surface area.

name: charchar
text: "Yo Momma's so fat it is beginning to adversely affect her health and self-esteem!"

name: yearsinhotclaws
text: Your mom's so fat that everyone died.

name: mercuri0us
text: Even the mayor!

name: fattypneumonia
text:
"Yo' momma got a wooden leg with a KICKstand, mothaFUCKA!

"Yo' momma got a mouth in the back of her neck, an' the bitch chew like this..."

name: riotdejaneiro
text: Yo Momma is blocking the way. Do you want to use the Poke Flute?

name: riotdejaneiro
text: Come to think about it, "poke flute" could be misunderstood as a euphemism for the male reproductive organ. Crap.

name: snowman
text: White bread snaps?

name: wonelove
text: the real-life version momma joke

name: lastlarf
text: A comment left by lastlarf was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by robobogle, Overmedicated, Spenham, Bellis)

name: biddlebubbly
text: I wonder if they still consider themselves the dirtiest dudes in town, or if dirtier dudes have come to the fore.

name: lizjones
text: When did Pat get his porkpie hat back?

name: vermy
text: Had he lose it before he came out of the closet? I'm unsure.

name: achilleselbow
text: I don't think he's out of the closet yet - I've been reading chronologically and still haven't seen any mention of it.

name: heccibiggs
text: So as of this second you're now four hours ahead of me in the archive.

name: charchar
text: You, madame, are 26 minutes ahead of me.

name: heccibiggs
text: Man I feel like we're all living parallel lives, off-kilter by just the smallest fractions of time.

name: sardoniclaconic
text: 2 days ahead of me

name: coffeecoaster
text:
I'm only 4 months behind.

It's better than five.

name: poodlelucy
text: crap, i'm four months behind YOU!

name: benthecartoon
text: A month behind youuuuuu.

name: unkle_bob
text: three weeks.

name: woodenteeth
text: I just clicked "random comic". I feel like I've been dropped into the game without choice. I don't have a lot of options.

name: aperson
text: Oh boy.

name: heccibiggs
text: Fail o'clock.

name: aperson
text: You don't get away that easy.

name: woodenteeth
text:
His feet. My god HIS FEET!

... and Bulge.

name: greenkoolayd
text: why did jerry orbach get his own action figure?  law and order isnt that exciting or tough.

name: greenkoolayd
text: actually, it looks more like tom bergeron.

name: mr_pete
text: Man, Phillippe stone cold does not get yo momma jokes, but that is okay. It is like saying Mingus does not get Bach. That is an okay thing, when you are your own crazy self.

name: geysershitdick
text: Mingus is totally down with Bach! I have no idea why you would say that thing you said about him not being down with Bach.

name: heyman
text: Mingus is down with jazz, jazz has always been down with bach.

name: adhesion
text: Yeah, Mingus actually quotes one of Bach's preludes from the Well-Tempered Clavier in the song "Taurus in the Arena of Life" off of Let My Children Hear Music. The more you know, baby.

name: fishies
text: Yeah fuck you Mr Pete!

name: wargasmic
text: No, Philippe totally gets yo momma jokes, but has chosen to transcend the status quo. He has started a revolution in yo momma joke comedy by adding a touch of realism.

name: straw
text: You're right! Wow, Phillipe is ruuuude .

name: bixschmix
text:
Phillipe revels in the layered ironies of postmodernism.

Or else he is Five.

name: boredom_man
text: Postmodernism revels in the layered ironies of Phillipe. And it is arguably fifty-five!

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by FuckYou, Nurdbot, tttt, toddster, slalvation)

name: vreeeee
text: To borrow a phrase, when you been knuckleheads since old times such things as dickishness and, hey, high-grade neuroses seem relatively unimportant.

name: thommy_h
text: You can always enjoy a glass of wine with a dude at Luigi's, no matter how much of a dick he is. It's a basic rule of life.

name: apricotta
text: Is most basic concept perhaps.

name: lastlarf
text: When you are young, jerks are ok. As you get older, not so much. Maybe you change, maybe they change? Who knows?

name: geysershitdick
text: The deal is it's like why in Trainspotting all those Scottish dudes still hang out with that Begbie prick. He's a mate, what can you do?

name: heyman
text: Everybody has a resident asshole in their group of friends, it's a role that must be filled. Pat just does too good a job

name: cpnglxynchos
text: "before you ask, yes, it's a mixed blessing."

name: zapatos
text: I'm also the whore, y puedo que hablar dos idiomas.

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
Phillipe is fit to hang with the dirtiest dudes in town.

"NOT THE MAYOR!" made me piss myself.

name: nurdbot
text: I would to love to see an extra panel from this of just the awkward after moment. How do you tell a 5 year old Otter his joke was wrong without hurting him?

name: dans
text: I'm sure Pat handled that.

name: nathanielperson
text: Without hurting him.

name: patkun
text:
I love how doubtful Philippe looks in the last panel. He doesn't quite know what's going on, but he'll just try his best anyway, because he's Philippe.
Come to think of it, isn't it a little weird that a 5 year old is driving out to the bay on his own?

name: closefriend
text: Achewood would make a badass racing game, with Phillippe in his car, Beef in the Volvo of Despair, and Pat in a car shaped like an erect penis.

name: stuart
text:
More like Cirus Penis in a phallic chariot. Or maybe a late model convertible Mustang?

Cornelius eschewing his Mini for the Old School Bus.

The finishing line is a lake, the photo-finish is on a paused webcam dismissed by being angled at Ray's crotch

name: rowboat
text: Don't forget Ray in the Escalade. And Todd in his van.

name: jlaw
text: the unlockable vehicle can be the ford galaxie from burnout summer

name: mattfish
text:
naw man that's beef's car, and pat's in his 70s stickered-up mustang.

Little Neph in his Civic

name: cpnglxynchos
text: maybe the Volvo can be the unlockable, then..all equipped with a special horn powerup that causes despair to disperse in a shockwave around the vehicle, causing those other drivers to weep and skid around, giving you the ability to properly Stand on it, Agnes.

name: stormagnet
text: Mr. Bear's Mini. With all the mods, including the Laphroig warmer.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Oh man. Oh man. This has to happen.

Are there any Acheworld members who happen to be handy with Flash, or whatever it is you crazy kids use to make them innarnet games?

name: budenhagen
text: I'd so love to have a doily launcher be a powerup in a cart racing game.

name: stuart
hateandwar
text: A comment left by hateandwar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Carpetbag, yingkaixing, VictoriaW, holly_golightly, CloseFriend)

name: tekende
text: Pat would be in a Prius or some other hybrid.

name: jonnay
text: I was confused by the tunnel to the bay at first, but I've come to my senses and now know it is just an entrance to the underground.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Today on a Very Special Achewood , a Very Special Boy learns that "special" isn't always a compliment.

name: petro
text: After locking myself out of my appartment while wearing a Philippe tee, my landlord took one look and me and said "you are a special boy, aren't you?"

name: heccibiggs
text: Man. That is unfortuante .

name: heccibiggs
text:
ARRRGGGGH fucking typo!!

Here comes a special girl.

name: thesyndicate88
text: Unfortuanté sounds like a shitty Italian Restaurant.

name: unkle_bob
text:
Unfortuante has a certain flair. Like what an italian farmer will name his firstborn because he aspires the boy to get an education and be a big businessman.

The farmer has such dreams...

name: rogergs
text: Philippe's a few snaps short of the dozens.

name: never_die
text: ray was serving up a nice hot dish of "yo mama" to pat before philippe arrived.

name: shoinan
text: My friend actually repeated this in a yo-mama contest. I had to summon all my willpower to prevent wetting myself from the laughter.

name: mo_rose
text: You know if you had wet yourself, your friend would have won and you'd be the dirtiest dudes in town.

name: qingofchina
text: I think that is why Bob O'Connor really died.

name: junko
text: The difference between Beef, Ray and Pat's expressions in the 5th and 6th panels makes it for me.

name: byronic
text: Phillippe is hardcore.  Keepin it real little otter.

name: jesler729
text: Oh my goodness this is a wonderful strip. I love how Philippe assumes they're already aware the mayor was present and doesn't bother explaining why.

name: implode
text:
When I first read the strip I loved it, but since you explained all the jokes, I now hate it.

O/5 rating, AND IT'S YOUR FAULT!

name: cagliostro
text: I'm not sure a 0/5 rating really works. It just means you've had no effect on the strip's rating whatsoever.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Go back and fix that. jesler729 is a dum-dum.
The mayor was 5 blocks away in his office as usual. That's how fat that momma was. Tsunami-mommy.

Philippe punishes.

name: cheeks_jd
text:
I see "Some even got on the mayor!" all over various interweb forums now.

Hats off to Onstad.

name: darthemed
text:
Pat is so shocked, his mouth fell open. And that is great.

Also, this one makes me think of President Philippe welcoming the Pope.

name: unfun
text: I don't know why the kid is so morbid this week maybe it's the weather

name: molesticide
text:
philippe is not quite sure what it is that he is saying.

beef and ray have just realized that they are no longer the dirtiest dudes in town.

pat was not prepared for what has just happened within his vicinity.

name: timasi
text: Am I just retarded or is Phillippe driving from the passenger seat in the first panel?

name: lamewad
text: Yeah he is. I also noticed that... weird.

name: domini
text: You're not retarded. And Philippe is not five.

name: woodenteeth
text: A comment left by woodenteeth was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Lumus, hellofditties, VictoriaW, slalvation)

name: woodenteeth
text: Wow. That's a kinda indefensible stance there woodenteeth. Oh look! You drew attention to making the same idiot point twice. Good on you. Special little guy.

name: presterjohn
text: the tiny double-line on the right side of the car suggests we are seeing it from an angle

name: wulvaine
text: Only if it's an American car.

name: jackparsons
text: I first thought that Philippe was entering a Tunnel Of Love in an amusement park. With the sign "flows to bay" overhead, which made it even better. In fact, I still think this is what happened.  Or he stole a golf cart, which seems out of character.

name: ctrl_z
text: Or he's driving the car Lyle made him.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: I think it's great that the three cats are hangin' together again.

name: redmange
text:
I use to question why the three cats hang out. Obviously Ray and Roast Beef hang out because they have been good since back in the day, not to mention Beef is one of the few people who can put up with Ray....but why do they hang out with that dick Pat?

I thought about this for a long time, and then I realized that in my group of friends, I am Pat. And I cried.

name: charchar
text: Please don't cry.  You could maybe not be Pat.  After all, Pat is a dick. Here is a chubby to foster goodness and warmth in your soul.

name: unclesma
text:
Because, without Pat, Roast Beef would not be the middle cat.
Oh dang he is on the left in this strip.

name: possums
text: Phillipe's mayoral obsession predates itself.

name: crankheart
text: i'm a year later, but i was completely up-to-date 3 years ago. which counts for nothing except the amount of lames i'll most likely receive.

name: wonelove
text: Beef and Ray have downed their drinks, but Pat's glass remains untouched.

name: ouroboros
text: but only Ray's glass is empty. that says a lot about him.

name: evilbobikus
text: Philippe is such a subtly dark character.

name: mrclumpy
text: The shocked look from the DDiT to Philippe's sublime one-upsmanship make this one of my favorites.

name: thegoodwillgirl
text: Reading through the archives is awesome, because I get to relive all of the things that have become so prevalent to assetspeak, "Some even got on the mayor" being one of them.

name: woodenteeth
text: Agreed! Not only that but you get to come across old comments made and marvel at your own stupidity. I have no idea what I was thinking in the past. I must have been drinking.

name: zapatos
text: I have always been drinking.  I make a point of it.

name: woodenteeth
text: What do you blame all of your previous innanity on then?

name: zapatos
text: Being inane.

name: mangtastic
text: Do you think it is rad to have alcoholism, zapatos?

name: y0uarem0m
text: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DownWq-lqn4&feature=related

name: redheron
text:
oh my god, philippe

I do not think when I was five that the phrase "hot bloody fat sprayed everywhere" would even have entered my mind.

name: srikamaraja
text: I have since begun to use this as my Yo Momma line, when things become mad dirty.

name: carlyle
text: One of Phillipe's gold moments.

name: sixtyswine
text: Pat is shocked.

name: sevenslashfour
text: I find it funny that Pat of all people looks the most shocked in the last panel.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Philippe wins.  Game over, man, game over.
